page.title: 18VILLAGE FARM HISTORY (2)
page.content:
and so they all left to live in the village. This became known in the end as the case of the{Horne Destitute {children.} Proof of this can be found in the Warwick's court records. The subsequent actions became a famous case in law. Although the name is spelt the same, the present owners have no connection with the Horne family of the l7th century.
{Old Town Farm}is a very old house. The reason it was called Old Town is because in the fifteenth century they built a lot of houses to make a small estate. In 1552{King Edward VI}was nearing death and the fall of the Royal Family meant that a vast amount of money fell into the hands of Old Town's owner. So he hid the money in{Bishops {Itchington pool}and at the accession
